title: Geologist Hater

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Geologist (3006) will always spawn alongside you
-Brandishing your obsidian knife will control the Geologist or one of their fascinated players into you, and then you will attack them with a wooden baseball bat that geologists can’t see
-You may not brandish your obsidian knife until N3, because it is not polished enough
-You are invincible until N3, because you are not afraid of getting the knife dirty until then
-You really hate geologists
